name: QUANTUM DICER
description:
Quantum Dicer is a fast passed, time-trial/rhythm/reactionary game designed to test you skills in quick thinking and precision movement. 

The game offer an infinite supply of procedurally generated stages, each harder than the last. 

There is a tutorial in the game that will guide you through the basics. 

- Controls -

W A S D - Dice movement

Left Mouse Button - ''Activate aligned side''

Use WASD to roll the dice around the x and y axes to align the highlighted face. 

Use Left Mouse Button to activate the aligned face and continue with the next task

- Game Jam theme explanation -

Game Jam Theme: "Roll of the dice"

During the game you are rolling a dice around to align the highlighted sides with the

 camera in order to complete the match and keep the timer ticking. Further more, the

 highlighted sides are randomly picked and the levels of the game are randomly

generated.

(You may encounter mild display issues if you are playing the game on a smaller screen)

You should be able to zoom in or out the webpage to fix this issue. 

(try using Ctrl and - or Ctrl and +) 

Please enjoy. Made for the GMTK Game jam.

Game music asset pack by Swngyill YOON.
